item.title: Michael B Jordan's Childhood Dream Marvel Role Is Set Up By The MCU's First 2025 Movie According To Captain America: Brave New World Theory
item.description: Michael B. Jordan is now closer to playing his dream Marvel role after an MCU future tease, years after he first joined the franchise as Killmonger.

item.title: Superman Movie Lawsuit Escalates As Creator's Estate Makes New Move In Attempt To Block James Gunn Movie From Releasing In Certain Countries
item.description: Warner Bros. Discovery continues to face legal trouble with James Gunn's Superman movie, as the film could be facing issues with its summer release.

item.title: The True Story Of 300's Battle Of Thermopylae
item.description: Zack Snyder's 300 focuses on the Battle of Thermopylae, but the truth of the historical battle is a different, and equally engaging, story.
